name: Devellage
description:
Devellage is an FPS game developed by a high school student in Japan.
You live with the villagers in the generated land. And you will order the villagers to make the village bigger and more stable.
You will feel the fear of robbery and the food shortage turmoil. Your mission is to save the villagers from them.

At first, You create fields and hire farmers to prevent hunger in the village.
If the fields is too small, food may not be sufficient, but if it is too large, the efficiency will deteriorate.

The village needs a bonfire. Bonfire maintains the well-being of the villagers.
To make a bonfire you first need a tree. I will make chopsticks from there.

As such, you need to protect the village from various perspectives.

All these tasks are left to the villagers.
But you are not free. You need to constantly monitor the village and order the villagers to keep the village secure.
